    • Constructor Detail

      • BIRTLogger

        public BIRTLogger(java.lang.String methodName,
                  java.lang.String reportName)
        BIRTLogger() is 1 of 2 constructors for this class. This constructor allows for the methodName and reportName to be set. This should match the report name you are debugging and the method in which your implementing this class.
        Parameters:
        methodName -
        reportName -

      • BIRTLogger

        public BIRTLogger()
        BIRTLogger() is 1 of 2 constructors for this class. This constructor takes no parameters. It excepts you to use the setters for reportName and methodName
